= Chapter 3: Conditions =

== Conditional Operators ==
== Equal
!= Not Equal
> Greater Than
< Less than
>= Greater than or equal to
<= Less than or equal to

== Expressions Demonstrated ==
5 == 5 True
5 != 5 False
5 > 5 False
5 < 5 False
5 >= 5 True
5 <= 5 True

== isdigit() ==
Character Handling library <ctype.h>
Takes a single parameter
isdigit(variable)

Ex.
`if ( isdigit(variable) == 0) {
  printf("Thank You\n");
}`

== Switch ==
`switch (variable) {
  case 'a': case 'A':
    //code
    break;
  case 'b': case 'B':
    //code
    break;
}`
